plot: A young boy with a rough life at home, finds an ad in the back of a bible with 1-800 number to God's personal phone number. When faced with adversity, the boy calls upon God for answers. But He doesn't pick up...
title: 1800-Answers
plot_es: A young boy with a rough life at home, finds an ad in the back of a bible with 1-800 number to God's personal phone number. When faced with adversity, the boy calls upon God for answers. But He doesn't pick up...
plot_en: A young boy with a rough life at home, finds an ad in the back of a bible with 1-800 number to God's personal phone number. When faced with adversity, the boy calls upon God for answers. But He doesn't pick up...
